name: Mall Mayhem with Karl Havoc
description:
YOU ARE CARMINE LAGUZIO!

As the host of popular TV prank show EVERYTHING IS UPSIDE DOWN, it's your job to go undercover as a little character called Karl Havoc in the Fairfield Mall and mess with people's day! 

Be sure to make sure Karl:

  • takes their lunch tray
  • steals a fry off their plate
  • talks loudly on his phone about his dog is loose

Suffice to say, Karl's A LOT. 

So what are you waiting for? Get in that mall and wreak havoc! Just listen to your producer Craig for instructions, keep an eye on your temperature gauge and under NO circumstances overheat! Good luck!
